// Guest Registration Notify Modification $helptxt['guest_notify_contents'] = 'Here is a list of popular BB codes;

url - Creates a URL which opens in a external same window/tab.
i - Italicise text.
b - Boldens text.
u - Underlines text.
img - Creates an image from the specified URL.
code - Wraps text in a code tag.
quote - Wraps text in a quote tag.
center - Centers text.
hr - Creates a horizontal rule.

You can find more here.';
